website_summaries.verdict: A super popular and super portable, the Sprocket is the best instant photo printer for sharing, and the stickers it produces are a ton of fun.
pros: It can connect to multiple devices at once
It’s got a ton of features for decorating and captioning photos
Lightweight and iPhone-sized for compact printing while on the go
Includes 2” x 3” glossy photo paper with optional sticky back to turn your photos into stickers
Can connect to your social media accounts to turn online into IRL photos
Easy to use connection via Bluetooth and downloadable app
cons: It’s pricier than competitors with similar features
Reports of the result containing too much blue

website_summaries.verdict: A portable, high-quality photo printer that produces vivid photos anywhere you want to go with its Bluetooth connectivity.
pros: Features a lightweight design that is compatible with a tablet or cell phone
Easily prints from social media for instant photos on the go
cons: It's somewhat expensive, but it has a lot to offer for the price

customer_reviews.title: Sharing your contact list and GPS location is required to use this thing.
customer_reviews.text: One shouldn't have to share their phone contact list and GPS location to print a picture. You can't do anything with this printer without doing the above. Also, the color blue is really washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with latest iOS devices
customer_reviews.text: This does not work with recent Apple products. We tried two iPhone Xs, an iPad Pro and an older iPad. Each says the accessory is not supported - first device I have ever encountered that is just totally incompatible. HP’s support website is littered with posts asking HP for help and none of their techs seem to have any clue and HP does not seem to be doing anything about it. Really a shame. I cant imagine why no one at HP isnt taking this more seriously. Do not buy this if you use Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: JCarlson

customer_reviews.title: Color is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. The colors are way off and requires quite a bit of retouching and color correction in other apps before printing will come out just OK. Also the app does not work unless you allow GPS location permissions which has nothing to do with printing pictures from a phone. I don't like it why would hp need to know where I am when I print photos. I'll keep it as a novelty but not good enough for scrapbooks. I bought more hp branded zink paper with the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Amz User

customer_reviews.title: COLOR and PRINT QUALITY HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to like this product like the idea of being able to give people prints without lugging a huge printer or having to get there address and ship prints, but the photos look like mud. The color management is awful I've tried multiple pack with multiple calibration cards nothing works. On top of the color this printer has horrible banding. The Photos attached are quick snaps with my phone that show a very cheap printer that isn't that high quality (actually a lot cheaper per print than the Zink Paper) vs the photos the Sprocket printed. And some close ups of that show the Banding. Just stay away from this printer!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lipps

customer_reviews.title: Cool Little IPhone printer
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our teen daughter and it is pretty cool and a lot of fun. The printing was better then I expected. It is not a high quality glossy print from Walgreens but it prints a decent photo. It took my daughter about 2 minutes to read directions, download app and print pictures from her phone.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Printer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this printer. The colors aren’t the exact same but they’re not too different. Overall it’s a great product and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I used this to print out some of my favorite pictures—most of which are illustrations—to put on a folder and they turned out great!! Actual camera photos were kinda grainy and the color varied (depending on the color dynamic) but were good enough for how much it cost. If you want to print out stickers to slap somewhere for personal enjoyment, I’d go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I did my homework before purchasing, so I knew that the print colors could sometimes be just slightly "off". So I stick with the recommended printer paper, keep the blue card from each new pack for cleaning and calibrating between print sessions - throwing the old one away when I open a new pack. And my print quality has improved. I am VERY happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Daile R.

customer_reviews.title: App and travel sized photos, bad print quality
customer_reviews.text: The new design I’m not crazy over but I bought this for the AR quality in the app and the “higher print quality”. It’s all as advertised except the print quality is not great. The color is off (but I half expected this), some photos come out with blue streaks (even the high quality images), and the White’s are way bright in most of my images. I can over look the white’s and off color however the blue streaks are not cool. And especially as a photographer who prints on the normal I’m not blown away by these prints. They get my journaling job done and that’s the reason I love it. But the print quality is sub par.
customer_reviews.author: Shannah

customer_reviews.title: just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: the printer worked one day and printed about a dozen photos within a few hours. literally the next day i wanted to print more and it would not even sync with my phone. apparently this is a common issue. i went through all the troubleshooting steps and emailed customer service (with some difficulty) and was told i was still under warranty, but i still cannot figure out how to replace it. dont waste your $
customer_reviews.author: PMSmonster

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This is complete junk. Will never connect to phone and the battery will not stay charged. Had to call Amazon support to get it to connect just now. Battery was at 100% and I printed two photos and now it is at 20%. Amazon support transferred me to HP Support and they have no idea what a Sprocket printer is!!! They kept asking me if I used an Windows or Mac computer! Total waste of $130.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as I wanted to see how it worked out before purchasing one for myself. The quality of the pictures are lacking somewhat in reference to the coloring but overall I did like the color and design of it. Gave it 4 stars because, I probably will purchase one for myself soon.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie bradley

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. It is the so much fun to have. She has printed tons of pictures and we are very happy with the quality. It stopped printing pictures randomly and I had to reset it by pushing a small button on the back and it was good to go again. The refill packs are not expensive like other brands which is why I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: ms.amazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little product!
customer_reviews.text: This is so so easy to use! I love it❤. If you just want or need small photos, this thing is ideal. The app is so user friendly! Picture quality as far as color goes is a little lacking in the saturation department but it's not awful. I don't regret it though. It does make noise while printing, not super loud or annoying, but I did want to mention it. I scrapbook and I love that I can print out my own photos, at any time, with STICKY BACKED PAPER!!😍 If this thing ever dies on me, I will be buying another one asap!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use but wanted other photos. I may consider buying the bigger version. Also the photo quality is not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Alyzza

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: A fun little product. No ink needed. Easily portable and I love that the photo paper can become stickers. I use this to print pictures off my phone when I’m traveling and put them in my journal. It holds a long charge as well I printed maybe three images in the span of three weeks without needing a top off charge.
customer_reviews.author: I’m not a bot

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best ZINK printer on the market (trust me, i've tried many). Photos aren't as good as you'd get from actual ink, but definitely amazing for zink quality, and the refills are the cheapest and most reasonably priced sticker backs i have found! Returned mine coz the machine is a bit expensive for me, but definitely a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consider This A Toy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The printer is easy to set up and prints quickly. The software as used on Android was fairly intuitive and worked well. Cons: Heavy banding throughout the pictures and abysmal color fidelity. As an experiment I printed a solid white image, the printed photo has artifacts and slight banding and light blue color. I have tried color correcting to the printer with very little success.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to setup/use, portable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer for its portability. Great little printer for on-the-go. The print quality is okay, but then I’m not expecting a high resolution print from this pocket-sized printer. It’s perfect for what I’m using it for (journaling). I like that there are no cartridges to replace. Just load the zink paper and go. Fun, easygoing set up/use, portable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeandf

customer_reviews.title: What fun this Amazon- sold product is, at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic little hand-sized printer that prints with the sink in the small photo papers and the photos are just the right size to include in a card, as well as to keep for myself in a much smaller space
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Barber

customer_reviews.title: Only printed two photos
customer_reviews.text: I just opened it and printed out 2 pictures then after that on the 3rd photo it stop and would not print out I went over the instructions again and checked the Bluetooth everything was right and it is charged but it is Not printing anymore pictures so I’m disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The print quality isn’t good, but does the job for scrapbooking
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the instax printers, the photo quality isn’t great. The pictures comes out grainy and has a blueish tint to them. But this printer and photo paper is half the price of the instax. I got the printer for about $50 and a pack of 20 sticker photo printer for $5. While the instax printer is currently sold for $80 and a pack of 20 photo paper is $12. For the price, it’s worth it more for my journaling and scrapbooking purposes. The sticky backing is also great. I was able to remove the photo carefully without ruining the photo or the paper and it was still sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: A cute little printer
customer_reviews.text: Well what I like about the sprocket it's a great little printer but it's not perfect. The good Small size Travels well no ink can pass through airports with ease Super easy to use and se up foolproof Not so good Small size 2X3 prints Needs work No 4X6 unless you purchase more expensive model You can buy glossy paper use your ink jet printer to produce same results However I love this little guy fun little printer in appropriate use
customer_reviews.author: Printer guy

customer_reviews.title: Very poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this printer for anything more than novelty. It’s quick and easy to use and I think reasonably priced per print. However the picture quality is extremely poor. The colors are not close the accurate and the image isn’t sharp. Also, 2x3 is pretty small. I was hoping to use it for a wedding album but the pictures aren’t good enough. For kids to put on a school binder or locker I’d recommend it but that’s about all. I’m trying the Canon Selphy next.
customer_reviews.author: ashley reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this junk!
customer_reviews.text: The printer will not connect with an Apple nor a Android. It only worked once or twice, and then it stopped connecting. Very upset with this product. Calling HP to see what they will do for me. Will update once I get an answer from them.
customer_reviews.author: J Ariel Muniz

customer_reviews.title: was printing pictures 5 minutes after opening the package
customer_reviews.text: this Sprocket 200 is what u want! It works great ,and pictures look just like any old school photo lab ,which is to say ,color is right and lines are tight! I was printing pics within 5 minutes of opening. And thats not exagerating, i am very happy with this printer and would recommend to anyone looking to buy. i did my homework and i could have got any printer on the market under 150$ and this is what was the better of the five i was looking at. i have printed 6 photos so far and alls well with the devise. buy it ifn u need one.
customer_reviews.author: 8ight6ix

customer_reviews.title: It has proven to be a lot of fun at parties
customer_reviews.text: For this new technology, this printer is a good product and I would buy it again. The pictures are not the best quality but I’m sure with R&D these little Printers will continue to improve. I would purchase this again. It has proven to be a lot of fun at parties.
customer_reviews.author: S. Makela

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: As a printer in general, it's very nice. The pictures come out as expected, they are not top quality/clarity but that is expected. The photos still turned out better than what I was expecting so I was happy with that. I used it at a bridal shower guestbook and everyone loved it! I had to let it cool down during the bridal shower because of how much it was used but I felt like I didn't have to wait too long and worked out well. The size is great and I like the color of the printer.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, slightly small
customer_reviews.text: I have an instax mini 9 and I'm super impressed how good this HP printer works. The biggest disadvantage of an instax is its inferior lens quality (the lighting has to be picture perfect, slightly more or less light will spoil everything). I like the fact that I can take photos on my phone and choose the good quality ones to print. I just wish I had measured how much was 2 inch by 3 inch. It is as big as instax mini minus the white spot in the bottom to write something. I wish the photos from hp sprocket were "slightly" bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Rav M

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had looked up many reviews for Pocket Printers and heard great things about the HP Sprocket. I wanted something that would print photos truest to color/quality as possible, and this highly underperformed. Every photo had a slim border of black, fuzzy ink around it, which was not in any of the original photos. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with quality for this price & size
customer_reviews.text: Go for it !!!! Happy with quality for this price & size.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD S.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and a fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! This product is really great for anyone who loves scrapbooking or other photo bobbie. it’s really helpful that the photos have a sticker back, saves time and money. The print quality could have been better, from a distance the pictures look nice but up close they are pixilated and the saturation does not do them justice. Definitely will be gift giving these in the upcoming holiday season!
customer_reviews.author: Irelynn

customer_reviews.title: Sprocket 200 worked fine for a week but can no longer connect, does not work with Apple Devices
customer_reviews.text: Sprocket worked fine for about a week then no longer able to connect to I Phones using the Sprocket App and or Bluetooth, tried all the recommended trouble shoot but still can not connect. Should note this is the 3rd Sprocket that worked fine at first and then just would not connect............ Returning the 3rd one for a refund and recommend not buying if using with an apple device
customer_reviews.author: danz

customer_reviews.title: Great for connecting via mail
customer_reviews.text: My grandma lives in a care facility and has always never been interested in learning how to use a computer. I bought this for printing out pictures to mail with letters, and I just got a message from my mom that I made Grandma's day. I also printed pictures of the friends I dont get to see because of quarantine, and put them by my computer I work at every day. They make me happy too :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Durivage

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product, Picture Coloring Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using the HP Sprocket for my scrapbook/planner/memory book items. However, the picture color is off, and I haven't found the magic numbers to get it to show closer to true-to-life coloring. Love the fact that the picture is instantly smudge-proof and it can be handled immediately. Sometimes the paper backing on the picture is challenging to remove. Overall though, it is fun to print pictures with the Sprocket.
customer_reviews.author: WJ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer to make little prints to put in my travel journal. It's pretty easy to use and the paper is not that expensive when bought in bulk. The print quality is better than I expected and the paper has adhesive on the back which makes it easy to put into my journal. The app that you use to connect your phone to the printer works fine. Great little printer.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Warning: Do NOT buy. The print quality is extremely horrible. You will have better luck taking the photos and printing them in your preferred size at your local Walgreens/Costco. No matter what any review on YouTube or elsewhere might state, do not do this to your pocket. Please.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, both were crap! Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one first, then bought another... not because they are so amazing, but because the first one printed everything with a pink tint. Terrible. Followed all the troubleshooting steps on HP... nothing worked. Such a disappointment, and such a crap product. The second one did the exact same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: My teenage daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This item is very easy to use, durable, and prints great quality little photo's. The app that downloads to your phone is very user friendly and you can use the printer with multiple different devices, not just one. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley n. Hay

customer_reviews.title: Small, portable printer.
customer_reviews.text: It's an average quality printer. Very small (2x3) prints. Uses a lot of power for such a small device. It needed a recharge after just a few prints. Very easy to carry around. I wouldn't recommend it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Schaap

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, the print quality is just soso according to friend
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend & would purchase again. No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Print quality is what I would expect from a kid’s toy. It’s a tad grainy & the colors are a bit off. Honestly it’s not a deal breaker as I wasn’t expecting professional prints. With that said the quality is more than fine for kids. I would both recommend & buy again. Our 11 year likes it & shares pics with her friends. It was her favorite gift.
customer_reviews.author: ZMommy

customer_reviews.title: Yes but ehh
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell if I don't know how to use it correctly or what but the picture quality always comes out on a orange tint. but i like the idea of it, portable and quick way to print pictures. The app is really nice as well. It has a lot of edit feature for the photo and you can add pictures and banners. I just wish i could reduce that orange tint.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it if you want it to gift it.
customer_reviews.text: The package came intact in a bubble wrap but upon opening it, the 'seal' is broken and stickers on the printer looks as if its been openened before. I turned it on, check on the photo paper that came with it, thank God it is not opened before. Photo came out okay, missing some blue tone and not as vibrant as expected. Overall experience is disappointed as the box has been opened before. I bought 2 of these and 1 is to be gifted. I havent opened the other one, lets hope that is in good gifting condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great small printer and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Good small printer if you did your research. The paper is about 0.50 per print but that relatively cheap compared to Instax which is smaller and more expensive. I did notice a blue outline but not very noticeable and didn’t affect the image. The contrast and quality is nice for the size. It comes with 10 in the box and you can get more for cheap if you get a bundle or the paper is on sale. Great to print out little photos for cute art projects.
customer_reviews.author: Fong

customer_reviews.title: First Impressions Are Good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't done too much research on this product, but this is the Sprocket 200. Not sure if it is the newer one, etc. I just thought it'd be cool for my journal accessories. Just got the the product today and as scheduled. I also just set up the printer and tested it out. I like it so far! First impressions passed.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy Ohana

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This one has power on issue, once automatically turned off, it will never turned on again. To fix this, you should reset it, and to reset it, you must "turn this on". This means you never never turn this on again. If you contact HP, they will do ping-pong with you on resetting this faulty one. Bottom line is, " Do not buy this".
customer_reviews.author: Youngtaeck Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cool product overall
customer_reviews.text: The colors don't come out as vibrant as I'd like, and although I absolutely love the idea of sticker photos, I'd hoped the stickers would stick better on a wooden craft surface when making ornaments for the students in my class. Still, they stuck well to paper, and my sprocket is a useful and fun product overall.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Good little print buddy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good little printer and pretty easy to use. Photo quality is decent but not amazing... in my opinion the quality is definitely acceptable for a Polaroid-style print. My only complaint is that from the item photo, I thought the top was a glittery pattern. It’s not. It’s just like a black and white speckled pattern. If I had realized, I probably would have ordered a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Cavender

customer_reviews.title: won't connect
customer_reviews.text: Have to return, was so excited to get this for mothers day but after several attempts, I can't get it to connect to my Samsung note 10+
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Most of theses come to find out have issues connecting to phones from what I found out. Piece of junk was a birthday present for my daughter and doesn’t work. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cool ink free printer
customer_reviews.text: What a cool option for printing photos without ink! My teen loves making these for friends and decorating his room, binders, cards, etc. Great product and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 8 year old girl present
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this printer, and uses her older iphone SE to print photos she takes with no problem. great tech for a younger person who wants to print and share pictures. its super portable and doesn't need to be plugged in when charged. I'd recommend this to anyone looking for a gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: MacMaven234

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using my Sprocket but the picture quality could be better. Not sure if the change needs to be in the product or the actual paper. But I have fun with it and use it to add photo memories for the month in my planner. I did have a problem with the charge not holding, but realized you need to hold the off button for about 3-5 seconds for it to totally shut down.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible photo quality
customer_reviews.text: The only thing good about this printer is how easy it is to use but you are looking for a good quality photo I wouldn’t suggest it. The photos I printed made me come out looking pink. It takes a little bit to print which isn’t terrible but the quality of the photo just isn’t good. It always favors one color more than the rest. I wouldn’t suggest it unless you were using it to have fun or create a cute quick craft that needs small photo.
customer_reviews.author: Jaun

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining,  bad printing quality.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, good quality, very nice interface and app to edit fun pictures. However, the printing (colors) is truly disappointing. Modern technologies should provide way better contrasts. Good for fun, parties. Not to create important memories pics.
customer_reviews.author: OSL.

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect! Although a little waste of printer paper :/
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, I used it to print little photos of my birds and I’m in LOVE with it! The only problem about is that whenever I print a picture, the first time I try to print it, it doesn’t work, then I push the button again to print and then it decides to work, but instead of one paper it prints out two! It’s a pretty big waste of the printer paper! Can someone please explain this? Apart from that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: SO cute!!  Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker than expected! Super convenient prints! Not quite as good quality as regular prints but almost! Prints are just about what you would pay to get them printed off at Walgreens or Walmart plus they can be used as stickers if you want. My son is in army boot camp and this is perfect to send him little pictures of what is going on at home and to help keep him connected ♥️♥️
customer_reviews.author: laurie2573

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime u spend on it
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for awhile and it’s everything I hoped it would be! Simple instructions and set up, small and easily concealed. It prints pictures perfectly and the sticker paper is even better-plus U can add designs to your pics or add your own words!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Estill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. I had purchase a couple for gifts. And work perfect for them . Now, I have to get a couple more. There's a couple of my friends was shock too see it works. I told them I will try. This was a perfect gift & gift for me too
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Printer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she is very happy with it. The pictures come out surprisingly well. I’d definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tami81

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and easy to use..
customer_reviews.text: Print quality is acceptable but comparing it to my selphy printer the printout seems to be flat and dull. Not sure if it can still be adjusted. Portability wise this is so convenient to carry around. It's just like carrying a power bank. Cost of consumables is a bit pricey. Average price per print is $0.50.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Poor tech
customer_reviews.text: I try many times but cannot connect to the machine. And also there’s no another way to connect it but Bluetooth. Poor tech.
customer_reviews.author: Junyi Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Bad print quality, defective.
customer_reviews.text: Such an unpleasant experience. To start off, it the package came ripped as if someone had opened or used it before. Second, as I tried turning on and connecting to device once again printer wouldn’t show or print anything. For the price the quality of the pictures were also pretty bad. I saw some dust on the roller inside it too. Don’t buy if you’re expecting nice, quality prints.
customer_reviews.author: E. M

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy-terrible pictures
customer_reviews.text: Good: The sprocket is very easy to use and prints quickly. Terrible: The pictures look awful. Everything is extremely dark and the colors are uneven. I’d save my money and use a crayon to draw a picture. It will take longer, but look better.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Printer prints cute little photos, the app is super easy to use, the photo quality is pretty good, great in fact, for such a small printer and one that uses no ink. Perfect for kids, teens, small albums, etc. I love mine and I hope my husband likes his little black book ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kay Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute for tweens and teens
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13yo for Christmas. She states it takes a long time to charge and she can only print 4 pictures before it dies. I’m pretty sure she did not let it charge completely before using so that might be the issue. The pictures are slightly grainy so don’t expect anything spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this less than 24 hours and I've already printed 50 or so stickers. I aDORE THIS LITTLE GADGET. Colors are a bit faded, but I don't mind. It's nothing terrible. It's very easy to set up and pair with your phone as well.
customer_reviews.author: S Hansen

customer_reviews.title: No worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I didn’t pay full price for this printer. I didn’t expect top quality photos but I did expect good color and clarity. The color is way off and the images are not crisp or clear. I would even recommend this for a child.
customer_reviews.author: booklover68

customer_reviews.title: perfect for intended use
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to take before/after/updated fitness pictures for my fitness planner. the small pictures fit perfectly in my happy planner and i can take them and print them out quickly with my phone. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little product! Super easy to use just download the app and it walks you thru everything. Wonderful little pictures perfect for journaling or including in some snail mail.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila oakley

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised at how great this little machine is
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because of all the mixed reviews but I am really glad I did. I got it for my 18 year old and she just loves it. It’s easy to use and the pictures come out adorable. Obviously you’re not going to get professional pictures but I think this is a really great little printer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Nohavicka

customer_reviews.title: not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended. Hardware is great. Software is very poor. Doesn't work on older phone models (Galaxy s7, s8), simply crashes. The new phones (note9) barely pull the software. It's very laggy, the gallery doesn't go back more than 40-50 pictures before crashing. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: peachmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for scrap booking
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 12 year old girl and also got a scrap book. She loved printing pictures of her friends, events and vacations and putting them in her scrapbook. The ink is in the paper, that is why the paper is so expensive. Buy the 50 pack, it's cheaper that way.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bellavance

customer_reviews.title: Fun little photo printer
customer_reviews.text: Love this little photo printer. Was a gift for my daughter and it’s awesome. The only thing she had to complain about was the black coming out discolored in the printed photo. We figured out how to adjust the black point in the photo before printing so it comes out darker in the print. Learning curve but still well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Print and share on the go
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received would not connect. After being replaced this printer is flawless. I think my 12 year old daughter went through 3 packs of film within an hour of opening it. Easy to use and setup.
customer_reviews.author: clark2298

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for teen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. Works great. Picture quality is really good for an sudo-polariod camera. Easy to use and charges quick.
customer_reviews.author: HNL

customer_reviews.title: Great for personalized cards
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this at first. I thought it was a waste of money. But it's actually really useful for thank you cards. You can print a picture and really personalize a card. Or birthday card or wedding card. Makes it simple and easy
customer_reviews.author: T. Ho

customer_reviews.title: Memories printed in a snap!
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have power. I used it to print photos for diaries of our trip to London with my granddaughters! They loved it! After all what better thing can you do on a 8 hr flight!!! Bring extra paper as you’ll love getting the memories on print!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little thing to have.
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to print my pictures on the go instead of having it in my phone or computer forever. I got these when they were on sale and I love it. Easy to use with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Bikki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought this product for my daughter so she could print some pictures off from her friends of high school and it connected to the phone so easy the printer quality and picture quality is amazing the only thing that I would recommend is if you could make one a little larger do you have a little bit bigger picture but as far as that we love it
customer_reviews.author: Terry R. Lawr

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my teenage niece. She has been asking for one and was super happy with this as her birthday present. Easy to setup and use. Fun to have the pictures up on the wall on display.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: The print quality was absolutely terrible. Sorry. I was pretty excited for this one because I have the Sprocket Studio and the quality off of that is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Allen

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient when you want to scrapbook. Prints out 2”x3” photos. The color and sharpness might be lacking a bit but it’s not bad. The size is perfect for scrapbooking versus having to go get pictures printed and then snipping it so it will fit. The product was as I expected it to be. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mini photo printer for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. The photo quality isn’t the greatest, but it’s perfect for a quick mini print. The best quality is that this comes with sticker paper, so you can stick them on to things.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Flud

customer_reviews.title: Fun buy
customer_reviews.text: I love my sprocket it’s fun to use and I keep it in my purse whenever I need to print something
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this little printer. It’s easy to take with me and everyone loves the little prints. Bought it mainly for art journals but use it for much more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this printer! It has a small learning curve when it comes to figuring how long to hold buttons or connecting to Bluetooth. It was really easy, however to connect to my new phone. I also like the editing features in the app.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what it's intended to do.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my kid, she loved it. She had it working in minutes. Printed a pretty impressive albeit small 2x3 photo. Great color, nice sharp image. The size was a minor concern to me, but the pictures will likely be given to friends, stuck on lockers, etc. So the size is perfect. The pink was a big hit, and the choice of led colors is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, fun product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for printing small photos directly from your iPhone. Love the styling of the printer, love the silicone cord management wrap included (Apple needs to do this), it even comes with ten prints!
customer_reviews.author: NeverMind

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing. The photos come out really clear and crisp!
customer_reviews.author: Tina De Nota

customer_reviews.title: Awesome printer
customer_reviews.text: This is one little awesome printer. My 13 year old loves to make pictures with her friends and share. Paper has ink in it so do not buy fake paper. Best present ever!!
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I finally got a HP Portable Printer. This is going to make documenting trips much easier to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work, second one works great.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Son in law coming by today, for the 2nd time, to try and get it to work. So disappointed!!!! Second one works great, just that battery doesn't last long. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A neat little printer for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little printer. The clarity of the pictures, and the color could be a little bit better, but for what it does, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Chandler

customer_reviews.title: So awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really like this I know I'm going to get a lot of use out of it. super easy to use I like the ability to edit my pictures love that its portable.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Printing on the go!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this pocket printer! She has printed out over 24 pictures already and just loves it. She’s able to connect her phone to it and print, her friends can use it too.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Potter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable printer
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use as our wedding guest book. It was super easy to set up and pair, and printing was super easy! I love that multiple people can pair to it and print. The photo quality is pretty great for a portable printer
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the right gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old granddaughter. She put it together and produced great pictures printed on stickers that I stuck to my iPhone. She is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: WM Leone

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the product yet but I'm excited to do so it looks good quality good pricing I am very happy with it Now I can print out all my pictures from my phone I'm so happy
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cook

product_meta.title: HP Sprocket Portable Photo Printer (2nd Edition) – Instantly Print 2x3 Sticky-Backed Photos from Your Phone – [Luna Pearl] [1AS85A]
product_meta.description: Color:Luna Pearl| Style:PrinterTurn every fun-filled memory and monumental adventure into instant, beautiful color prints with the HP Sprocket Photo Printer. Weighing in at under a pound with the dimensions of an average smartphone, the HP Sprocket is built to fit into your pocket, backpack, or purse with ease. Easily print 2 x 3" sticky-backed photos and display them anywhere to make your space more unique. The HP Sprocket app lets you customize photos with borders and stickers, print from social media or your camera roll, and even view your photos in augmented reality. Easily view photo libraries from the app, share photo albums, and get recommendations for the best photos from any collection. This echo white HP Sprocket Photo Printer comes with 10 sheets of 2 x 3" peel-and-stick backed ZINK photo paper to get you started. Operating temperature range - 41 to 104°F
feature_bullets: INSTANT PHOTOS ON THE GO – Easily print your favorite adventures on 2x3 inches sticky-backed photo paper with this luna pearl smartphone-sized photo printer that's designed to easily slip into your pocket, purse, or backpack

GET THE PRINT PARTY STARTED – Now you can connect multiple devices so you and your friends can print at the same time – plus the personalized LED light shows you whose photo is printing. Power consumption- Idle- 0.55 W, Printing max- 31-32 W, Average- 16 W

AUGMENTED REALITY FUN – Scan your Sprocket using your smartphone and the Sprocket app to view a virtual photo queue of print jobs and more as we continually add new features to the app Compatible operating systems - Android 44 above / iOS 80 aboveMinimum system requirements - Not compatible with MacOS, Not compatible with Windows
SHARE THE MOMENTS – Share customized photo albums with friends using the HP Sprocket app and keep the fun going
PERSONALIZE YOUR PRINTS – Decorate, design and print your social media photos with the HP Sprocket app so you can decorate your walls with your favorite photos.Resolution (color):313 x 400 dpi
ALWAYS CONNECTED – Now with Bluetooth 50 and sleep mode, HP Sprocket stays connected when not in use so it’s ready to print the moment you are, without draining your battery
INCLUDES HP ZINK PHOTO PAPER – Load the 10 sheets of 2x3-inch paper into your pocket printer and create smudge-proof prints; this paper has peel-and-stick backing for instant photos or stickers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,645 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
